messages.subject: Re: NHK Music Vid
messages.msgSnippet: Oh you re very welcome. I ve always seen music vids as a medium to relive the show/or aspect of a show in a short span. I enjoy making them and watching as
messages.messageBody:
Oh you're very welcome. I've always seen music vids as a medium to
relive the show/or aspect of a show in a short span. I enjoy making
them and watching as well. So for those who have music vids, I hope
they post too for both our sakes. ^__^

Ja ne!
--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, Celina Yuka Hashimoto

i miss Shinsengumi!!!!!! i always been trying to dl english subb ver. but my computer is a stupid machine............

hajimenokizu <mg_batt@...> wrote:
Hello your friend in hibernation is here again... LOL! I hope
everyone is doing well.

Just letting you guys and gals know I made a music vid for NHK. ^__^
Check it out and enjoy for ummm what it is. I have no idea what the
song is about except that I like it. Which pairs are you going to
see?

Kondou and Tsune (my fave couple)
Serizawa and Oume (very interesting couple)
Yamanami and Akesato (by request, but these two are a give coz I
bawled at their love story)
Hijikata and girl (sorry I forgot her name - again by request)
Okita x Hide x Todou (well more like Todou coz okita gets like two
seconds. I'm sorry Souji fans, we all love Souji but Todou seemed
nicer for Ms. Hide and it's fun with a little love triangle)

Okay then... Everyone take care. Till next time.

Oh here's the link:
http://www.hajimenokizu.com/nhklove.htm

~Kizu

messages.subject: NHK Music Vid
messages.msgSnippet: Hello your friend in hibernation is here again... LOL! I hope everyone is doing well. Just letting you guys and gals know I made a music vid for NHK. ^__^
messages.messageBody:
Hello your friend in hibernation is here again... LOL! I hope
everyone is doing well.

Just letting you guys and gals know I made a music vid for NHK. ^__^
Check it out and enjoy for ummm what it is. I have no idea what the
song is about except that I like it. Which pairs are you going to
see?

Kondou and Tsune (my fave couple)
Serizawa and Oume (very interesting couple)
Yamanami and Akesato (by request, but these two are a give coz I
bawled at their love story)
Hijikata and girl (sorry I forgot her name - again by request)
Okita x Hide x Todou (well more like Todou coz okita gets like two
seconds. I'm sorry Souji fans, we all love Souji but Todou seemed
nicer for Ms. Hide and it's fun with a little love triangle)

Okay then... Everyone take care. Till next time.

Oh here's the link:
http://www.hajimenokizu.com/nhklove.htm

~Kizu
